definition: Michelle Kwan (1980-), former American figure skater, Olympic medalist
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: However, Kwan recovered to win another US championship title.
sentences.chinese: 不過，關穎珊恢復了過來，在全美錦標賽中再次奪冠。

sentences.english: I don't think Michelle Kwan is false at all.
sentences.chinese: 我壓根沒覺得關穎珊很虛僞，但我覺得她很謹慎。

sentences.english: Kwan has relatives in Beijing and Hong Kong and has been to Asia many times.
sentences.chinese: 關穎珊有親戚住在北京和香港，曾多次去過亞洲。

sentences.english: Kwan continues to perform in skating exhibitions.
sentences.chinese: 同時關穎珊繼續參加各種花樣滑冰表演賽。

sentences.english: Of course, volunteer work is nothing new for Kwan.
sentences.chinese: 當然，志願者工作對關穎珊來說並不陌生。
